Sentencas: Glasses with composition 50BaO-(5-x) Al2O3-xR2O3-30B2O3-15SiO2 (x = 0,5 and R = Nd, Gd, La, Dy) have been synthesized by conventional melt quenching method.
Titulo: Rare earth added barium alumino borosilicate glass-ceramics as sealants in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Controlled crystallization has been carried out to convert these glasses to corresponding glass-ceramics.
Titulo: Rare earth added barium alumino borosilicate glass-ceramics as sealants in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) technique has been used to identify the crystalline phases formed in glass-ceramics.
Titulo: Rare earth added barium alumino borosilicate glass-ceramics as sealants in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Archimede's method has been used to measure the density of glassceramics.
Titulo: Rare earth added barium alumino borosilicate glass-ceramics as sealants in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The co-efficient of thermal expansion of all glass-ceramics lie within the range (11.60 - 12.81) x 10-6/ degrees C, which matches with that of the other components of solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Rare earth added barium alumino borosilicate glass-ceramics as sealants in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The interaction study of glassceramics with Crofer22APU interface and Crofer22APU/Glass-ceramic/Crofer22APU showed no evidence of interfacial failure and cracks.
Titulo: Rare earth added barium alumino borosilicate glass-ceramics as sealants in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Hence the prepared glass-ceramics can be considered as a suitable candidate for sealant materials in SOFC applications.
Titulo: Rare earth added barium alumino borosilicate glass-ceramics as sealants in solid oxide fuel cells
